title: The unfrozen caveman striker
author: VD
content_html:
I thought Tevez was the standout player in the last World Cup, so it’s not terribly surprising that he’s having success in the Premiership. It’s nice to see him playing for a team like West Ham, too, although I cannot understand why none of the big clubs went after him. Unlike Sheva, who has been a big disappointment after moving from Milan to Chelsea, Tevez is tough enough to thrive in the more physical English league.

And speaking of Milan, this time they will put Liverpool away as they should have done last year.
